document_data.name: Issacortae
document_data.mainbody: The '''Issacortae''' people inhabited the western part of the wild lands of [[Ama Basin]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description: The Issacortae were medium build and muscular with black curly hair. Semi-nomadic tribes of Issacortae followed herds of [[elk]] and [[reindeer]], which they raised. Agriculture was practiced to a small degree, and fishing and hunting occasionally.
document_data.Combat: The weapons used by the tribes were usually [[axe]]s, [[bow]]s, [[spear]]s, and [[club]]s.

Society.Religion: Usually religion had a very large impact on the tribes. They commonly practiced [[Wikipedia:Animism|animism]] and [[Wikipedia:Shamanism|shamanism]]. [[Shaman]]s could be men or women. Shamans were often treated with great respect and awe by the population.
